section.p: The Mental Status Observation template represents an observation about mental status that can come from a broad range of subjective and objective information (including measured data) to address those categories described in the Mental Status Section. See also Assessment Scale Observation for specific collections of observations that together yield a summary evaluation of a particular condition.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-14255, CONF:1198-14256, CONF:1198-32565 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.74"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Cognitive Status Result Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.74)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1198-14249)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1198-14250)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1198-14257)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-14591)/@code="373930000" Cognitive function (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:1198-32788, CONF:1198-32789)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1198-14254)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1198-19092)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1198-14261)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (CONF:1198-14263)
contain zero or one [0..1] text
contains zero or more [0..*] interpretationCode
contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode
contain zero or one [0..1] targetSiteCode with @xsi:type="CE"

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1198-14266)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-14469, CONF:1198-14595, CONF:1198-14470)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Assessment Scale Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.69)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] referenceRange such that it (CONF:1198-14267)
The referenceRange could be used to represent normal or expected capability for the mental function being evaluated.
contain exactly one [1..1] observationRange such that it
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire

contain [0..1] author such that it
Conforms to Author from CDA

contains [0..*] entryRelationship such that it
Conforms to Non Medicinal Supply Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.50)

contains [0..*] entryRelationship such that it
Conforms to Caregiver Characteristics (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.72)
If value/@xsi:type="CD", SHOULD contain a code from SNOMED CT (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) (CONF:1198-14271)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1198-14249)

The referenceRange could be used to represent normal or expected capability for the mental function being evaluated.
contain exactly one [1..1] observationRange such that it
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire

contains [0..*] entryRelationship such that it
Conforms to Non Medicinal Supply Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.50)

Conforms to Caregiver Characteristics (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.72)
text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15924)
reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15925)
This reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15926)

The value for 'code' in a result observation SHOULD be selected from LOINC (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) Laboratory results SHOULD be from LOINC (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or other constrained terminology named by the US Department of Health and Human Services Office of National Coordinator or other federal agency. Local and/or regional codes for laboratory results are allowed. The Local and/or regional codes SHOULD be sent in the translation element. (CONF:7166)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] referenceRange. Such referenceRanges, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observationRange. This observationRange SHALL NOT contain [0..0] code (CONF:7152)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] author (CONF:7149)
text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference/@value (CONF:15924)
This reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15926)
If value/@xsi:type=CD, SHOULD contain a code from SNOMED CT (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) (CONF:14271)
If value/@xsi:type="CD", SHOULD contain a code from SNOMED CT (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) (CONF:1198-14271)

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:14255, CONF:14256 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.74"
Consol Cognitive Status Result Observation text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference/@value (CONF:15924)

Consol Cognitive Status Result Observation This reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15926)
Consol Cognitive Status Result Observation If value/@xsi:type=CD, SHOULD contain a code from SNOMED CT (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) (CONF:14271)
SHALL conform to Result Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2)
Consol Cognitive Status Result Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:14249)
Consol Cognitive Status Result Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:14250)
Consol Cognitive Status Result Observation SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:14257)
Consol Cognitive Status Result Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:14591)/@code="373930000" Cognitive function finding (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:14592)
Consol Cognitive Status Result Observation SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:14258)
Consol Cognitive Status Result Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:14254)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus)
Consol Cognitive Status Result Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:14261)
Consol Cognitive Status Result Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (CONF:14263)
Consol Cognitive Status Result Observation SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] interpretationCode (CONF:14264)
Consol Cognitive Status Result Observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:14265)
Consol Cognitive Status Result Observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] targetSiteCode with @xsi:type="CE" (CONF:14270)
Consol Cognitive Status Result Observation MAY contain [0..1] author such that it (CONF:14266) Conforms to Author from CDA

Consol Cognitive Status Result Observation MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:14272, CONF:14593, CONF:14273) Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR, and Conforms to Non Medicinal Supply Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.50)

Consol Cognitive Status Result Observation MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:14276, CONF:14594, CONF:14277) Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR, and Conforms to Caregiver Characteristics (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.72)

Consol Cognitive Status Result Observation MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:14469, CONF:14595, CONF:14470) Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP, and Conforms to Assessment Scale Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.69)
Consol Cognitive Status Result Observation SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] referenceRange, where its type is Reference Range (CONF:14267)
SHALL conform to CDA Reference Range
Consol Reference Range SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observationRange, where its type is Observation Range (CONF:14268)
Consol Observation Range observationRange SHALL NOT contain [0..0] code (CONF:14269)
SHALL conform to CDA Observation Range
